directions: Stir ketchup, mustard, smoked pepper, onion granules, hot pepper sauce, and granulated garlic together in a bowl; funnel into a squeezable bottle and refrigerate between uses.
ingredients: 1/4 cup prepared yellow mustard (such as French's®)
2 tablespoons ground smoked black pepper (such as McCormick® Smokehouse®)
2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
title: Stan's Seasoned Ketchup
